name: GetBankAccountDetailsByV1Id
description:
Retrieve bank account details using V1 ID.

Call this tool to get detailed information about a bank account by providing its V1 ID. Useful for accessing account information in applications that previously used V1 identifiers.

parameters.name: bank_account_v1_id
parameters.description: The Connect V1 ID of the desired BankAccount for retrieving details. Refer to the Squareup documentation for more details.

value_schema.description:
Connect V1 ID of the desired `BankAccount`. For more information, see 
[Retrieve a bank account by using an ID issued by V1 Bank Accounts API](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/bank-accounts-api#retrieve-a-bank-account-by-using-an-id-issued-by-v1-bank-accounts-api).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: v1_bank_account_id
parameters.description:
Connect V1 ID of the desired `BankAccount`. For more information, see 
[Retrieve a bank account by using an ID issued by V1 Bank Accounts API](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/bank-accounts-api#retrieve-a-bank-account-by-using-an-id-issued-by-v1-bank-accounts-api).

value_schema.description:
Connect V1 ID of the desired `BankAccount`. For more information, see 
[Retrieve a bank account by using an ID issued by V1 Bank Accounts API](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/bank-accounts-api#retrieve-a-bank-account-by-using-an-id-issued-by-v1-bank-accounts-api).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
